text: Kanishka's conquest of Greater Bactria happened when the Parthian Empire lost major parts of its significant province of Bactria to the expanding Kushan Empire, led by its ruler Kanishka I. == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:Ancient India Category:History of Central Asia Category:Kushan Empire
title: Kanishka's conquest of Greater Bactria
